Total Nodes supply: 20,000 Nodes are sold in 30 Tiers, from $500 to $3545. More details can be found in theNode Sale Sheet. Purchasing a Node before $SWORLD TGE provides instant access to unlocked tokens at TGE.SeeNode rewardsfor more information. Moreover, 15% of the revenues generated by the node sale will be used transparently to buy back $SWORLD tokens on the market. Anyone can generate a referral code directly on the Seedworld website. The referral system activates starting at Tier 7, offering a 15% rebate to the code owner and a 5% discount to the buyer.
